event.title: Located on the south-eastern slopes of Mount Kenya, the town of Embu had a population of 41,092 in 1999

data.event: Located on the south-eastern slopes of Mount Kenya, the town of Embu had a population of 41,092 in 1999.

event.title: was carved out of the former Embu district in the 1990s

data.event: Mbeere was carved out of the former Embu district in the 1990s and Siakago town, about 25 km (16 mi) east of Embu town was made its headquarters.
